metadata.title: CVE-2021-47104 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: IB/qib:Fix memory leak in qib_user_sdma_queue_pkts() The wrong goto label was usedfor the error case and missed cleanup of the pkt allocation.Addresses-Coverity-ID: 1493352 ("Resource leak")

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
